entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as disheveled and soot-blackened, indicating she was affected by the fireworks. She is also mentioned to be snarling at Professor Flitwick's classroom door.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is described as having a squeaky little voice and is thanked by Umbridge for getting rid of the sparklers. He also closes his classroom door in her face.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned to be watching Umbridge with immense satisfaction as she leaves Professor Flitwick's classroom.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are described as heroes that night in the Gryffindor common room for their fireworks display. They are congratulated by Hermione and others.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned to be fighting her way through the crowd to congratulate Fred and George on their fireworks display.

relationships.description: Umbridge interacted with Professor Flitwick when she asked him to get rid of the sparklers and he agreed, but also closed his classroom door in her face.
Harry observed Umbridge leaving Professor Flitwick's classroom with immense satisfaction.
Hermione congratulated Fred and George on their fireworks display, indicating that they were appreciated by her.
Fred and George's fireworks affected Umbridge, causing her to be disheveled and soot-blackened.
